item.title: UAE’s G42 teams up with Cerebras to deploy 8 exaflops of compute in India
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description: Abu Dhabi-based tech company G42 has partnered with U.S.-based chipmaker Cerebras to deploy eight exaflops of compute through a new system in India

item.title: General Catalyst commits $5B to India over five years
item.dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
item.description: The pledge marks a sharp jump from General Catalyst's earlier $500 million–$1 billion India earmark.

item.title: Google’s new Gemini Pro model has record benchmark scores — again
item.dc:creator: Lucas Ropek
item.description: Gemini 3.1 Pro promises a Google LLM capable of handling more complex forms of work.

item.title: Nvidia deepens early-stage push into India’s AI startup ecosystem
item.dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
item.description: Nvidia is working with investors, nonprofits, and venture firms to build earlier ties with India's fast-growing AI founder ecosystem.

item.title: Why these startup CEOs don’t think AI will replace human roles
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description: The CEOs of Read AI and Lucidya told TechCrunch at Web Summit Qatar that they see AI tools replacing tasks, rather than workers.

item.title: YouTube’s latest experiment brings its conversational AI tool to TVs
item.dc:creator: Lauren Forristal
item.description: YouTube is testing conversational AI on smart TVs, allowing viewers to ask the assistant questions related to the video they're watching on the big screen.

item.title: Reddit is testing a new AI search feature for shopping
item.dc:creator: Aisha Malik
item.description: A small group of users in the U.S. will start to see search results that include interactive product carousels with pricing, images, and direct where-to-buy links.

item.title: All the important news from the ongoing India AI Impact Summit
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description: India is hosting a four-day AI Summit this week that will be attended by executives from major AI labs and Big Tech, including OpenAI, Anthropic, Nvidia, Microsoft, Google, and Cloudflare, as well as heads of state.

item.title: OpenAI reportedly finalizing $100B deal at more than $850B valuation
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan
item.description: OpenAI is reportedly getting close to closing a $100 billion deal, with backers including Amazon, Nvidia, SoftBank, and Microsoft. The deal would value the ChatGPT-maker at $850 billion.

item.title: Reload wants to give your AI agents a shared memory
item.dc:creator: Dominic-Madori Davis
item.description: Reload announces a $2.275 million raise in a round led by Anthemis and the launch of its first AI employee, Epic.

item.title: OpenAI, Reliance partner to add AI search to JioHotstar
item.dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
item.description: The rollout includes two-way integration that surfaces streaming links directly inside ChatGPT.

item.title: Co-founders behind Reface and Prisma join hands to improve on-device model inference with Mirai
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description: Mirai raised a $10 million seed round to improve how AI models run on devices like smartphones and laptops.

item.title: For open source programs, AI coding tools are a mixed blessing
item.dc:creator: Russell Brandom
item.description: AI coding tools have enabled a flood of bad code that threatens to overwhelm many projects. Building new features is easier, but maintaining them is just as hard.

item.title: Altman and Amodei share a moment of awkwardness at India’s big AI summit
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description: When Prime Minister Narendra Modi prompted speakers at the event to join hands and raise them in a show of unity, all executives onstage obliged, except OpenAI's Sam Altman and Anthropic's Dario Amodei, who held their hands conspicuously apart.

item.title: Freeform raises $67M Series B to scale up laser AI manufacturing
item.dc:creator: Tim Fernholz
item.description: “I think we're the only quote-unquote manufacturing company out there that has H200 clusters in a data center on site."

item.title: Reliance unveils $110B AI investment plan as India ramps up tech ambitions
item.dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
item.description: Reliance has begun building multi-gigawatt AI data centers in Jamnagar, with more than 120 MW of capacity expected to come online in 2026.

item.title: OpenAI taps Tata for 100MW AI data center capacity in India, eyes 1GW
item.dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
item.description: OpenAI also plans to expand its presence in India with new offices in Mumbai and Bengaluru later this year.

item.title: OpenAI deepens India push with Pine Labs fintech partnership
item.dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
item.description: OpenAI moves beyond ChatGPT in India with a Pine Labs deal targeting enterprise payments and AI-driven commerce.

item.title: Is your startup’s check engine light on? Google Cloud’s VP explains what to do
item.dc:creator: Theresa Loconsolo
item.description: Startup founders are being pushed to move faster than ever, using AI while facing tighter funding, rising infrastructure costs, and more pressure to show real traction early. Cloud credits, access to GPUs, and foundation models have made it easier to get started, but those early infrastructure choices can have unforeseen consequences once startups move beyond […]

item.title: Google Cloud’s VP for startups on reading your ‘check engine light’ before it’s too late
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan, Theresa Loconsolo
item.description: Startup founders are being pushed to move faster than ever, using AI while facing tighter funding, rising infrastructure costs, and more pressure to show real traction early. Cloud credits, access to GPUs, and foundation models have made it easier to get started, but those early infrastructure choices can have unforeseen consequences once startups move beyond […]
